description: MHKiT™ -MATLAB is a MATLAB package designed for marine renewable energy applications to assist in data processing and visualization. The software package include functionality for: -Quality control analysis -Wave resource and wave performance -River resource and device -Tidal resource and device -Data visualization -Mechanical loads analysis -Power quality assessments
name: MHKit™ -MATLAB (Marine and Hydrokinetic Toolkit) [SWR-20-42]
